forum.content:
Today, one of my friends, who sent a line message that he was planning to return my suits and shoes and then I met with him.

While I was already saying bye, he said that he was feeling down because broke up with her.

Then, I turned off my motorcycle and turned back to say that I would like to listen if you’d like to say something what you happened and how you decide.

After the conversation, I hope he could know that everything is inevitable; we all are looking for something to experience.

On this path to goal, we’ll be down or feeling hard through these actually we don’t want, then find out what we need to get and that’s changing.

You probably fell in love, maybe high school.

The girl was always too focused on the future and tried to fix you.

Don’t worry man, it’s okay.

The main point is the girl help you reflect and be thankful for the past you’ve been on, also you can be yourself and being happy to do thing for her.

She’s just right person.

So don’t get you nervous on love, to experience love.

This is for you, bro

by Allen
forum.title: 「You felt so hard, you are changing」
